TopicTitle: Artemis I: The Start of a Legacy

Articles.Content:
This is the Artemis I, the start of my now 5 strong series.

Even though it\'s only two stages, it\'s pretty easy to fly, I added both an extra RCS Tank and RCS Thrusters for increased stability. My first landing was a success, the problem was getting back, I literally had to fly back to Kerbin with RCS Thrust(In Kerbal Style if I might add 8))!

I see you also named your moon program after Apollo\'s sister. Mine\'s Diana, the Roman version of Artemis.

Did that bottom stage get you all the way to Mun orbit?

Is sticking fuel tanks side-by-side like that stronger or weaker than using hardpoints?
